name: Nuclear power plant simulator
description:
Today is your first day of work at the nuclear power plant!

The power plant produces clean energy with no risks. We are so proud of how safe is our power plant that we let you, with no qualifications, work for us!

On your first day, you sit in the control room of the 3 main reactors and you are able to control the power production through the control panels. Produce the power required and try to don't get fired!

New areas and controls can be unlocked on future updates.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ

- Is the game finished?

The game is still in an experimental version. A new and huge update is being prepared for the steam release.

- Mac support?

On the list!

- Steam version?

Nuclear power plant simulator has been voted and approved on steam greenlight and will be soon available on steam!

Greenlight page: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
